page.title: 01Areas of Gorleston.
page.content: This area can be divided into four main parts. These are : 1Residential area of Gorleston. 2The Beach and Cliffs. 3Farming land. 4Tourist facilities. The residential area is a mixture of new estates and older type housing.The new estate is the Cliff Park Estate.On the sea front the houses are large and very expensive. The Beach is sandy and at intervals there are groynes to stop the current and waves from removing the sand. The Cliffs are only 45 feet high and also suffer from erosion. The Farmland is used for arable farming The main crops are wheat,barley,and potatoes. This area is also an important area for tourism.There is the beach,golf course and a holiday camp at Hopton.
